name: Solar System (itch) (GaryJoe)
description:
This is my Solar System project. I added these elements to the game:

  1. Mercury
  2. Venus
  3. Mars
  4. Jupiter

I tried to make some aspects of the planets similar to the real world. I added a tilt to Earth's axis and I set Venus' rotation to be quite slow and backwards. I also gave the comets a slight halo effect similar to how they would look in reality.

Created by Nick Garijo
